aboutHover.slogan: Your Documents, Your World: Easy, Fast, Online!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Official documents and online government services.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.content: Find, access, and download official documents easily.

identity.title: Identity
identity.content: Explore your official ID, crucial for personal identification and legal purposes.

driversLicense.title: Driver's License
driversLicense.content: Details about your driver's license, essential for safe navigation on roads.

insuranceCard.title: Insurance Card
insuranceCard.content: Learn about your health insurance card, providing access to medical services.

carDocuments.title: Car Documents
carDocuments.content: Access important paperwork related to your vehicle for a smooth journey.

titleDeed.title: Title Deed
titleDeed.content: Explore details of your title deed, confirming ownership of real estate.

universityDiploma.title: University Diploma
universityDiploma.content: Details about your university diploma, confirming your successful completion of studies.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.content: Welcome to our online platform, designed to serve the residents of Germany with a convenient and efficient way to access official documents, upload necessary files, and schedule appointments.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: We are a team dedicated to simplifying administrative processes and improving the lives of German citizens. Our platform is here to make government services more accessible and user-friendly.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.content: Document Repository: Find, access, and download official documents easily. Whether you need personal identification, certificates, or permits, we've got you covered.

Email.title: Email
Email.verify: Please visit your email to verify your account
